title: Manmohan Singh: Educational Qualification of the Architect of India's Economic Reforms | Times of India
snippet: Dr. Manmohan Singh, born on September 26, 1932, hailed from Gah, a village in British India's Punjab region, now part of Pakistan. ... Raised in a modest Sikh family background, Singh received his early education in local schools within his hometown.
